articles.author: José Tadeu Arantes
articles.title: Study uses thermodynamics to describe expansion of the universe - Phys.org
articles.description: The idea that the universe is expanding dates from almost a century ago. It was first put forward by Belgian cosmologist Georges Lemaître (1894–1966) in 1927 and confirmed observationally by American astronomer Edwin Hubble (1889-1953) two years later. Hubble…
